titles: A second parallel together with a vvrit of error sued against the appealer.
author: Featley, Daniel, 1582-1645.
publisher: Printed [by J. Haviland] for Robert Milbourne,
notes: A reply to: Montagu, Richard.  Appello Caesarem.

"A second tablet" begins new pagination and signature Aa..
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
